note: Manually curated Commander decklists (100 cards each including commander)
instructions: Add decklists here in the format shown below.
Each decklist must have exactly 100 cards total (99 + 1 commander).
Deck text format: Commander name on first line, then '1 Card Name' or 'Card Name' for each card.
